titleStmt.title: An exposition vppon the thirtie two psalme describing the true manner of humbling and raising vppe of Gods children. Set foorth by Maister David Blak.
titleStmt.author: Blake, David, fl. 1600.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Walde-graue, printer to the Kings Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: At the foot of the title page: Cum priuilegio Regio.
Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
